articles.title: World Cup Final view from France: It will take 40 years to forget this defeat to Argentina
articles.description: For French people, losing to West Germany in Seville in the semi-finals of the 1982 World Cup is the most glorious defeat in our history. We were leading 3-1 in extra-time but Germany came back to 3-3 before we lost on penalties.
articles.content:

articles.title: After Messi’s World Cup win with Argentina, video of Maradona reacting to his international debut resurfaces
articles.description: Maradona, present in the stands during the game at the Ferenc Puskás Stadium back in 2005, can be seen rejoicing as he watches the long haired forward come on.
articles.content:
After having missed out on the opportunity in 2014, Lionel Messi finally lifted the World Cup along with Argentina in 2022 as La Albiceleste beat France 4-2 on penalties in the summit clash on Sunday.
